name: Smashing Spree
description:
I learned about this game jam about 19 hours before the deadline and pushed myself for the past 6 hours straight on a school night to make this game. I would have worked on more aesthetics and a menu system, but at the time of uploading this, it is 4:10 AM with 8 hours remaining, and school starts in 3 hours. This was fun, and a learning experience! I hope you enjoy smashing things in my game :)

(PS! This was my first time building in APK so I also attached a .zip  file for the PC build as well, just in case anything goes wrong)
